Package sample.ch.ffhs.c3rbytes.dao

Class DatabaseEntryDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.ch.ffhs.c3rbytes.dao.DatabaseEntryDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao
    public class DatabaseEntryDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dao
    This class is the pivot between the classes DBConnection and the controllers.
    Author:
    Jérémie Equey

      • setupUserDBWithPassword

        public void setupUserDBWithPassword​(java.lang.String newPasswordDB)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Methode to setup user of the db with a password. on first call, database will be create if it does not exist: (create=true). DB is created with an url passed to dbConnect()
        Parameters:
        newPasswordDB - the new password
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the transaction failed, an error is raised.

      • changeBootPassword

        public void changeBootPassword​(java.lang.String newBootPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPasswordDB)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        change the bootpassword of the db. it is the encryption key.
        Parameters:
        newBootPassword - a new Bootpassword (encryption key)
        newPasswordDB - a new Password for the database user (cerbytes)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occur during this process, an SQL exception is raised.

                throws java.sql.SQLException

        Throws:

      • setupEncryption

        public void setupEncryption​(java.lang.String encryptionKey)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        methode to setup the encryption. During the first start (and first creation of the db), a bootPassword is applied and become the encryption key. to start the db, the bootpassowrd has to be provided.
        Parameters:
        encryptionKey - the bootpassword tio be used as the encryption key.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the connect() methode encounters a problem with the database, a sql exception is raised.
